subject: Umpires
Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: At the major-league level, there may be no call that an umpire has not made and no angle on a play that an umpire has not seen. Then the playoffs begin.
snippet: At the major-league level, there may be no call that an umpire has not made and no angle on a play that an umpire has not seen. Then the playoffs begin.
